response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also maximizing the value I receive for such a valuable asset. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between our respective interests. I look forward to discussing this further and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
